components.name: Fastlane CLI
components.description: Ruby executable that parses lane definitions, loads plugins, and orchestrates tasks.

components.name: Plugin System
components.description: Dynamic loading of Ruby gems that implement specific actions (e.g., upload to App Store).

components.name: Configuration & Credential Store
components.description: Local YAML/JSON files and encrypted keychain that hold API keys, certificates, and lane definitions.

components.name: External Services
components.description: Remote APIs (Apple Developer Portal, Google Play, CI/CD, Slack, etc.) accessed via HTTPS.

components.name: Local Filesystem
components.description: Repository of app binaries, screenshots, and metadata used by Fastlane.

data_flows.description: Reads lane definitions and decrypts stored credentials.
Sends signed binaries, metadata, and build artifacts over HTTPS.
Plugins perform actions such as uploading to App Store or posting to Slack.

trust_boundaries.name: Local Machine Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates the user’s local environment from external services.

trust_boundaries.name: Plugin Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Isolates third‑party plugin code from core Fastlane logic.
